mapper.insert: INSERT INTO GOODS (GOODS_NO, GOODS_TEAM, GOODS_PRODUCT_NAME, GOODS_PRICE, GOODS_PRODUCT_CODE, GOODS_FROM, GOODS_MAKE_DATE, GOODS_OUT_DATE, GOODS_CATEGORY) VALUES (SEQ_GOODS_NO.NEXTVAL, #{goodsTeam}, #{goodsProductName}, #{goodsPrice}, #{goodsProductCode}, #{goodsFrom}, #{goodsMakeDate}, #{goodsOutDate}, #{goodsCategory})

INSERT INTO GOODS_IMAGE ( GOODS_IMAGE_NO, GOODS_IMAGE_TYPE, GOODS_IMAGE_REP_YN, GOODS_IMAGE_REAL_PATH, GOODS_IMAGE_WEB_PATH, GOODS_IMAGE_ORDER, GOODS_NO, REG_DATE, UPDATE_DATE ) VALUES ( SEQ_GOODS_IMAGE_NO.NEXTVAL, #{goodsImageType}, #{goodsImageRepYn}, #{goodsImageRealPath}, #{goodsImageWebPath}, #{goodsImageOrder}, #{goodsNo}, SYSDATE, SYSDATE )
